decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s):
LC_21_41GOLDSMITHAVE_05 rev B (Existing and proposed sections),

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, in the interest of proper planning. | The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies D3 & D4 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), polices 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012). | The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall not project more than 150mm from the roof plane and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).
| No part of the flat roofs of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policy D3 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Single storey rear/side (wrap around) extension (following demolition of existing rear extension walls); alterations to the fenestration of the existing side elevation, involving installation of a new sash window in lieu of existing window at first floor level; roof extension to main rear roof slope; and roof extension to main rear and rear outrigger roof slope (following demolition of existing rear roof extension); installation of one roof light to front roof slope
